notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: LCPNC: prepared the manuscript, analyzed and performed the laboratory tests; LDS: Reviewed the manuscript and analyzed the results; DMT, JAMS, ICGL, and HRR: performed the laboratory tests, reviewed the manuscript and analyzed the results; RSB and ECSJ: provided support for phylogenetic analysis of the detected samples; ACRP: performed the laboratory tests; YBG: Reviewed the manuscript, analyzed the applied methodology and results and was involved in general discussions with the first author. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
